explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the relationship between firm-specific return variation (FSRV) and stock returns, using statistical and econometric methods such as portfolio sorting and Fama-MacBeth regression. There is no mention or use of machine learning techniques, neural networks, or any other AI-related methods in the title or abstract. The study is grounded in financial economics and does not involve any of the listed keywords related to machine learning or artificial intelligence.
